item.description:
Happy New Year Everyone - Frohes Neues Jahr 2009!

Let's get this new year started and meet for a beer or two and some good chats at Fado's Irish Bar and Restaurant at the Twin River Casino! We have a few new members, whom we would like to meet too, so don't be shy and come along!! :-)

Would be great to hear how everyone's Holidays went. I know some of us spent some time across the big pond in Germany and we'd love to hear from your experiences - how you liked the German "Gluehwein" and the Christmas markets and all the other traditions. Come and tell us!!

Hope to see many of you on Friday!

- Hanna
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be waving a German flag!!
item.name: HAPPY NEW YEAR!! Lets get back into business!!!
